Package com.github.kaktushose.jda.commands.dispatching.adapter

Interface TypeAdapter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type the adapter parses
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioChannelAdapter, BooleanAdapter, ByteAdapter, CharacterAdapter, DoubleAdapter, FloatAdapter, GuildChannelAdapter, GuildMessageChannelAdapter, IntegerAdapter, LongAdapter, MemberAdapter, NewsChannelAdapter, RoleAdapter, ShortAdapter, StageChannelAdapter, TextChannelAdapter, ThreadChannelAdapter, UserAdapter, VoiceChannelAdapter
    public interface TypeAdapter<T>
    Generic top level interface for type adapting.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Kaktushose

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Optional<T> parse​(@NotNull String raw, @NotNull GenericContext context)
      Attempts to parse a String to the given type.
      default String sanitizeMention​(@NotNull String mention)

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        Optional<T> parse​(@NotNull
                  @NotNull String raw,
                  @NotNull
                  @NotNull GenericContext context)
        Attempts to parse a String to the given type.
        Parameters:
        raw - the String to parse
        context - the GenericContext
        Returns:
        the parsed type or an empty Optional if the parsing fails

      • sanitizeMention

        default String sanitizeMention​(@NotNull
                               @NotNull String mention)
        Sanitizes a String containing a raw mention. This will remove all markdown characters namely < @ # & ! > For instance: <@!393843637437464588> gets sanitized to 393843637437464588
        Parameters:
        mention - the raw String to sanitize
        Returns:
        the sanitized String
